trans-unit.source: Sorry, we couldn't find any supported font data in this file.

trans-unit.source: Requires application restart to take effect.
Search by name or unicode hex

trans-unit.source: This app is designed to replace the Windows Win32 Character Map. It is more DPI aware on high DPI screens.
trans-unit.target: Windows Win32 எழுத்துக்குறி வரைபடம் பதிலாகப் பயன்படுத்த இந்த பயன்பாடு வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. இது உயர் DPI திரைகளில் அதிக DPI விழிப்புணர்வு கொண்டது.

trans-unit.note: Xaml FontIcon. Does not need translation.
Xaml SymbolIcon. Does not need translation.

trans-unit.source: Existing font pending delete. Please restart app.
trans-unit.target: எழுத்துரு நீக்கம் நிலுவையில் உள்ளது. தயவுசெய்து பயன்பாட்டை மறுதொடக்கம் செய்யுங்கள்.

trans-unit.source: Some fonts could not be completely removed right now. These fonts will not show in the application and will be completely removed next time the app is launched.
trans-unit.target: Some fonts could not be completely removed right now. These fonts will not show in the application and will be completely removed next time the app is launched.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong whilst we were trying to save the image.
trans-unit.target: மன்னிக்கவும், நாங்கள் படத்தை சேமிக்கும் போது ஏதோ தவறு நடந்தது.

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Drag fonts into the app to copy them to your library.
trans-unit.target: உங்கள் நூலகத்திற்கு நகலெடுக்க எழுத்துருக்களை பயன்பாட்டிற்குள் இழுக்கவும்.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this font from your library?

trans-unit.source: Copy error to Clipboard and open GitHub
To help us debug and fix this for you, please consider opening an issue on our GitHub page and posting the details. We'll try and fix it right away!
trans-unit.target: To help us debug and fix this for you, please consider opening an issue on our GitHub page and posting the details. We'll try and fix it right away!

trans-unit.source: Toggle instant search. If disabled, you can start a search by using the enter key or pressing the search icon.
trans-unit.target: உடனடி தேடலை இயக்கு/அணை. முடக்கப்பட்டிருந்தால், நீங்கள் தேடலை enter விசை அல்லது தேடல் படவுரு மூலம் துவங்கலாம்.

trans-unit.source: The size of individual characters inside the character grid. Smaller sizes may affect performance.
trans-unit.target: எழுத்துக்குறிகள் கட்டத்திற்குள் உள்ள தனிப்பட்ட எழுத்துக்குறியின் அளவு. சிறிய அளவுகள் செயல்திறனை பாதிக்கலாம்.

trans-unit.source: Show the tools for XAML developers, like Symbol Icon and Font Icon.
trans-unit.target: சின்ன படவுரு மற்றும் எழுத்துரு படவுரு போன்ற XAML உருவாக்குநர்களுக்கான கருவிகளைக் காண்பி.

trans-unit.source: Choose the dev language for developer features content.
trans-unit.target: உருவாக்குநர்கள் அம்சங்கள் உள்ளடக்கதிற்கான Dev மொழியைத் தேர்வுசெய்க.

trans-unit.source: Animates the character grid when resizing the window. Turning this on can incur a large performance penalty when resizing the window.
trans-unit.target: சாளரத்தை மறுஅளவிடும் போது எழுத்துக்குறி கட்டத்தை அசைவூட்டம் செய்யும். இதை இயக்கினால், சாளரத்தை மறுஅளவிடும் போது ஒரு பெரிய செயல்திறன் அபராதம் ஏற்படலாம்.

trans-unit.source: Choose the font used to display the names of fonts in the font list.
trans-unit.target: எழுத்துரு பட்டியலில் எழுத்துருக்களின் பெயர்களைக் காட்ட பயன்படுத்தப்படும் எழுத்துருவைத் தேர்வுசெய்க.

trans-unit.source: Override the in-app language. Requires a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: பயன்பாட்டிலுள்ள மொழியை மாற்றவும். செயற்படுத்து மறுதொடக்கம் தேவை.

trans-unit.source: The size in pixels of exported PNG images.
Enables subtle depth shadows on the UI. Only noticeable when using the Light theme. Turning this on may have a small performance impact on weaker devices. Requires a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: UI இல் நுட்பமான ஆழ நிழல்களை இயக்கும். வெளிச்சப் பயன்முறையை பயன்படுத்தும் போது மட்டுமே குறிப்பிடத்தக்கது. இதை இயக்குவது பலவீனமான சாதனங்களில் ஒரு சிறிய செயல்திறன் தாக்கத்தை ஏற்படுத்தலாம். செயற்படுத்த மறுதொடக்கம் தேவை.

trans-unit.source: Controls most animations inside the application. Turning this off will disable most animations. Turning this on has negligible performance impact.
trans-unit.target: எழுத்துரு பட்டியலை ஏற்றுதல், எழுத்துருக்களை மாற்றுதல் மற்றும் எழுத்துக்குறிகளை மாற்றுதல் ஆகிய அசைவூட்டத்தை கட்டுப்படுத்துகிறது. இதை இயக்குவதன் மூலம் செயல்திறன் பாதிப்பு மிகவும் குறைவாக இருக்கும்.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Xaml PathGeometry. Does not need translation.

trans-unit.source: Up to 50 pages can be printed at a time. Select the range of pages to print here.
trans-unit.target: ஒரு நேரத்தில் 50 பக்கங்கள் வரை அச்சிட முடியும். இங்கு அச்சிட வேண்டிய பக்கங்களின் வரம்பைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

trans-unit.source: This page is outside the current page range and will not be printed. You can change the page range in the Page Setup section.
trans-unit.target: இந்தப் பக்கம் நடப்புப் பக்க வரம்பிற்கு வெளியே உள்ளது, அதனால் அச்சிடப்படாது. பக்க வரம்பை நீங்கள் பக்க அமைவு பகுதியில் மாற்றலாம்..

trans-unit.source: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.
trans-unit.target: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.

trans-unit.source: Enables transparency effects in the UI. If transparency is disabled in Windows settings, this will have no effect. May have a minor effect on performance on older or weaker devices.
trans-unit.target: UI இல் வெளிப்படைத்தன்மை விளைவுகளை செயல்படுத்தும். Windows அமைப்புகளில் வெளிப்படைத்தன்மை முடக்கப்பட்டால், இது எந்த விளைவையும் ஏற்படுத்தாது. பழைய அல்லது பலவீனமான சாதனங்களில் செயல்திறன் மீது ஒரு சிறிய விளைவை ஏற்படுத்தலாம்.

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong and we couldn't start the app right now. Please consider posting details about this error to GitHub so we can help you fix it.
trans-unit.target: ஏதோ தவறு நடந்தது, தற்போது பயன்பாட்டை தொடங்க முடியவில்லை. இந்த பிழை பற்றிய விவரங்களை GitHubக்கு இடுகையிடுவதை கருத்தில் கொள்ளவும், எனவே அதை சரிசெய்ய நாங்கள் உங்களுக்கு உதவ முடியும்.

trans-unit.source: Font listings are out of date. Click to relaunch the app.
trans-unit.target: எழுத்துரு பட்டியல்கள் காலாவதியாகிவிட்டது. மீண்டும் ஏற்ற கிளிக் செய்க.

Drag files from File Explorer or your desktop and drop them here to import them.

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source:
You can import fonts into the application to view them without installing them in Windows.
Imported font files are copied into the app's private storage, so will still show if you delete the original file on your computer.
trans-unit.target:
You can import fonts into the application to view them without installing them in Windows.
Imported font files are copied into the app's private storage, so will still show if you delete the original file on your computer.

trans-unit.source:
Choose how to name font files when exporting them.
System will return the name of the font file Windows uses in uppercase. Optimized will create a smart name based on Font Family and Font Name.
This application makes use of the following open source libraries
trans-unit.target: இந்த பயன்பாடு பின்வரும் திற மூல மென்பொருள்களைப் பயன்படுத்துகிறது

trans-unit.source: This font has variable features. To explore them, switch to Type Ramp view using the switch button above.
trans-unit.target: இந்த எழுத்துருவில் மாறி அம்சங்கள் உள்ளன. அவற்றை ஆராய, மேலே உள்ள காட்சி பொத்தானை பயன்படுத்தி, வகை ராம்ப் காட்சிக்கு மாறவும்.

trans-unit.target: Shows or hides the preview pane on the right of the screen. If turned off, many functions can still be accessed by right clicking or touch holding on a character inside the character grid.

trans-unit.target: Open all font files found inside a folder

trans-unit.source: Enables subtle bounce animations when the mouse pointer goes over certains buttons.
trans-unit.target: Enables subtle bounce animations when the mouse pointer goes over certains buttons.

trans-unit.source: Add and manage custom options to show in Type Ramp view and Comparison window text suggestions. Tap and hold to arrange.
trans-unit.target: Add and manage custom options to show in Type Ramp view and Comparison window text suggestions. Tap and hold to arrange.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, characters are grouped by Unicode range in the character map, otherwise all characters are shown in a single ungrouped list.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, characters are grouped by Unicode range in the character map, otherwise all characters are shown in a single ungrouped list.

trans-unit.source: This font contains COLRv1 glyphs. To preview them with proper rendering support, switch to Type Ramp view using the switch button above.
trans-unit.target: This font contains COLRv1 glyphs. To preview them with proper rendering support, switch to Type Ramp view using the switch button above.

trans-unit.target: {0} Font Families, {1} Font Faces installed on your computer

trans-unit.source: Deprecated icon glyphs are hidden by default based on your settings. You can show them using the filter button above.
trans-unit.target: Deprecated icon glyphs are hidden by default based on your settings. You can show them using the filter button above.

trans-unit.source:
Please read all of instructions before continuing to install your font
1. Press "Start" below 2. Select "Windows Font Viewer" and choose "Just once" or "open" 3. Press "Install" in the top of the font viewer Window
Your web font will be converted to OTF format for installation.
trans-unit.target:
Please read all of instructions before continuing to install your font
1. Press "Start" below 2. Select "Windows Font Viewer" and choose "Just once" or "open" 3. Press "Install" in the top of the font viewer Window
Your web font will be converted to OTF format for installation.
trans-unit.note: Word in such a way that encourages the user to read all the steps before continuing

trans-unit.source:
If enabled, hides deprecated icons in Segoe MDL2 and Segoe Fluent Icon fonts by default. Icons can still be shown using the filter flyout.
Referencing deprecated icons by unicode codepoint is not recommended, and all deprecated icons have non-deprecated equivalents.
trans-unit.target:
If enabled, hides deprecated icons in Segoe MDL2 and Segoe Fluent Icon fonts by default. Icons can still be shown using the filter flyout.
Referencing deprecated icons by unicode codepoint is not recommended, and all deprecated icons have non-deprecated equivalents.

trans-unit.source: Include version number in file name
trans-unit.target: Include version number in file name

trans-unit.source: The most customary jyutping (Cantonese) reading for this ideograph.
trans-unit.target: The most customary jyutping (Cantonese) reading for this ideograph.

trans-unit.source: The modern Korean pronunciation(s) for this ideograph in Hangul, with its source(s) in brackets.
trans-unit.target: The modern Korean pronunciation(s) for this ideograph in Hangul, with its source(s) in brackets.

trans-unit.source: The Pronunciations and Frequencies of this ideograph, based in part on those appearing in 《現代漢語頻率詞典》 <Xiandai Hanyu Pinlu Cidian>
trans-unit.target: The Pronunciations and Frequencies of this ideograph, based in part on those appearing in 《現代漢語頻率詞典》 <Xiandai Hanyu Pinlu Cidian>

trans-unit.source: The 漢語拼音 Hànyǔ Pīnyīn reading(s) appearing in the edition of 《漢語大字典》 Hànyǔ Dà Zìdiǎn (HDZ) specified in the kHanYu property description (q.v.).
trans-unit.target: The 漢語拼音 Hànyǔ Pīnyīn reading(s) appearing in the edition of 《漢語大字典》 Hànyǔ Dà Zìdiǎn (HDZ) specified in the kHanYu property description (q.v.).

trans-unit.source:
The Japanese readings(s) for this ideograph expressed in Kana.
Readings expressed in Hiragana are generally considered Kun-yomi (訓読み), and readings expressed in Katakana are generally considered On-yomi (音読み).
trans-unit.target:
The Japanese readings(s) for this ideograph expressed in Kana.
Readings expressed in Hiragana are generally considered Kun-yomi (訓読み), and readings expressed in Katakana are generally considered On-yomi (音読み).

trans-unit.source: The Japanese pronunciation(s) of this ideograph in the Hepburn romanization.
trans-unit.target: The Japanese pronunciation(s) of this ideograph in the Hepburn romanization.

trans-unit.source: The Sino-Japanese pronunciation(s) of this ideograph.
trans-unit.target: The Sino-Japanese pronunciation(s) of this ideograph.

trans-unit.source: The Korean pronunciation(s) of this ideograph, using the Yale romanization system.
trans-unit.target: The Korean pronunciation(s) of this ideograph, using the Yale romanization system.

trans-unit.source:
The most customary pīnyīn reading for this ideograph.
When there are two values, then the first is preferred for Simplified Chinese (zh-Hans (CN)) and the second is preferred for Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant (TW)).
When there is only one value, it is appropriate for both.
trans-unit.target:
The most customary pīnyīn reading for this ideograph.
When there are two values, then the first is preferred for Simplified Chinese (zh-Hans (CN)) and the second is preferred for Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant (TW)).
When there is only one value, it is appropriate for both.

trans-unit.source:
This represents the Mandarin and Cantonese readings(s) of the ideograph in the Soengmou San Zidin (商務 新字典, New Commercial Press Character Dictionary).
Mandarin readings are in hànyǔ pīnyīn. Cantonese readings are in jyutping. Note that some ideographs have readings which would ordinarily be considered invalid, such as polysyllabic readings.
If an ideograph has multiple entries, it means that the ideograph has multiple definitions and the readings are grouped in order of those definitions.
trans-unit.target:
This represents the Mandarin and Cantonese readings(s) of the ideograph in the Soengmou San Zidin (商務 新字典, New Commercial Press Character Dictionary).
Mandarin readings are in hànyǔ pīnyīn. Cantonese readings are in jyutping. Note that some ideographs have readings which would ordinarily be considered invalid, such as polysyllabic readings.
If an ideograph has multiple entries, it means that the ideograph has multiple definitions and the readings are grouped in order of those definitions.

trans-unit.source: The Tang dynasty pronunciation(s) of this ideograph, derived from or consistent with T’ang Poetic Vocabulary by Hugh M. Stimson, Far Eastern Publications, Yale University 1976.
trans-unit.target: The Tang dynasty pronunciation(s) of this ideograph, derived from or consistent with T’ang Poetic Vocabulary by Hugh M. Stimson, Far Eastern Publications, Yale University 1976.

trans-unit.source: One or more Hànyǔ Pīnyīn readings as given in Tōngyòng Guīfàn Hànzì Zìdiǎn.

trans-unit.source: Create collections to compare, export or manage multiple fonts at once. To get started, select an existing collection above or create a new one.
trans-unit.target: Create collections to compare, export or manage multiple fonts at once. To get started, select an existing collection above or create a new one.

trans-unit.source:
If enabled, the app will remember the last selected collection or filter and restore it when the app is restarted.
Otherwise, "All Fonts" is selected by default on every launch.
trans-unit.target:

Otherwise, "All Fonts" is selected by default on every launch.
